act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 我会一点，我学了一年。你会摄影吗？
item.pinyin: Wǒ huì yīdiǎn, wǒ xué le yī nián. Nǐ huì shèyǐng ma?

item.hanzi: 我也是，我刚买了个专业相机。
item.pinyin: Wǒ yě shì, wǒ gāng mǎi le gè zhuānyè xiàngjī.
Tài bàng le, ràng wǒ kànkan ba.
